data.name: Shoot on Sight
data.detailed_description:
Shoot on Sight is a fast paced tactical action Isometric game. Engage yourself in a tactical conflict between thugs and cops! Fight your way through your enemies for victory! If you're a thug, try to protect your asset or if you're a cop, try to bust the thugs and bring victory to your team.
In SoS teamwork is important but you can win if you're on your own! Just try to dodge the bullets and blast your enemies with a grenade launcher!
SoS is for all isometric shooter lovers where quick reactions is a MUST! Wish you luck in there!

features:

  • Play as a cop or a thug
  • Play in beautiful maps that made with Unreal Engine 4
  • Balanced maps that timing is important
  • Fast paced tactical gameplay

data.short_description: Shoot on Sight is a fast paced tactical action Isometric game. Engage yourself in a tactical conflict between thugs and cops!
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit version
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 525m or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Gefore GTX 960 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
